item.title: Obama rallies Virginia and New Jersey in weekend campaign push before Election Day
item.description: Obama's Saturday appearances for Abigail Spanberger and Mikie Sherrill contrast with Trump spending the weekend at his Mar-a-Lago estate in Florida.

item.title: Trump threatens Nigeria with potential military action, escalates claim of Christian persecution
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday said he's ordered the Pentagon to begin planning for potential military action in Nigeria.

item.title: Canadian prime minister says he told Ontario's premier not to run anti-tariff ad that upset Trump

item.title: Hegseth says U.S. is ready to share tools to help allies counter an 'aggressive' China
item.description: Pentagon chief Pete Hegseth on Saturday committed to support Southeast Asian countries with technology to help them respond jointly to Chinese threats...

item.title: 'Trump effect' raises hopes for cannabis rally as investors bet on federal reforms, softer marijuana stance
